Name: Gs. Viveros Group
description:
Norman’s main source of income is growing corn and beans. He lives in the community of La Jutosa, where he has been living for 30 years. He has been working in agriculture for 20 years.

Norman is requesting the loan to be able to plant a parcel of beans and purchase compost, insecticide, and fertilizer in order to obtain a good harvest that will generate good profits for him. His dream is to continue to improve his farming technique and growing in the field of agriculture in order to be able to choose a better life for himself and his family.

He is requesting the loan with the following people: Jose, whose main source of income is growing corn and beans, Josue, who has earned a living growing corn and beans for a long time, Alfonso, whose main source of income is agriculture, and Ramon, whose main source of income is agriculture since he works growing beans.

Peña Blanca, Honduras - January 2017
